title: Knife, 1985-103-112, ca. 1700–25
markings: On blade; HOW, mark of Ephraim How, Sheffield Dagger, London Cutlers' Compagny; see; Hayward, J.F., ENGLISH CUTLERY, (London, V&A, 1956) p. 11, 16, 17, 38, 39, plate XVIII, XIX
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade, plain bolster. Silver ferrule, engraved. Flaring, faceted agate handle, metal pin on top of handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
